original_text: And when the ten heard it, they began to be indignant at James and John.
korean_text: 열 제자가 듣고 야고보와 요한에 대하여 화를 내거늘

sentences.original_text: And when the ten heard it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 열 사람이 그것을 들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: they began to be indignant at James and John.
